title: News24.com | The poor, starving and forgotten people of Diepsloot: 'We are not going to survive this virus'
description: "We understand the reasons for the lockdown, but itâs difficult to abide by the rules". Three elderly people from Diepsloot have told News24 while waiting for their grant payouts from Sassa.
content:
We understand the reasons for the lockdown, but it’s difficult to abide by the rules, three elderly people from Diepsloot said on Monday while waiting for their grant payouts from the South African Social Services Agency (Sassa).
